Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: District at Chamblee is an established multi-building workplace that boasts flexible environments and distinctive open atriums well suited to companies in search of a controlled space for their team to gather.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Positioned within a serene urban woodland in the eastern pocket of I-85â€™s evolving corridor, District offers in-town convenience and endless potential for forward-looking companies focused on promoting wellness in a thriving community.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: District at Chamblee is an established multi-building workplace that boasts flexible environments and distinctive open atriums well suited to companies in search of a controlled space for their team to gather.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
District at Chamblee boasts direct access to I-85, nearby access to
I-285, on-site MARTA bus stops and connectivity to the Chamblee
Station. Providing easy connection to all areas of Atlanta.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Walking Distance to Chamblee MARTA Station

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5115 New Peachtree Road sits in the highly sought-after Chamblee area in northeast Atlanta. The 3-story building, located in an Opportunity Zone, contains 16,740 square feet of well-conditioned office space. Additionally, plenty of parking exists for all tenants. The property sits only a short walk from the nearby Chamblee MARTA Station, and, as rents in premier in-town and suburban submarkets continue to rise, more tenants are turning to the Chamblee market. Tenants of 5115 New Peachtree Road enjoy a peaceful, easy-to-access office setting without paying rents quoted by recently remodeled loft offices in Chamblee.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE: 5115 New Peachtree Rd  |  Chamblee, GA
